overview: It's drinks all round in Blokes Down the Boozer as blokes go down their mate's boozer then blokes go down on their mates - go on Tony suck that fucking cock. Six horny lads chillin an havin a laugh want a blow job and they don't care how they get it. Fuck the birds? No not possible and there's no fucking stripper. So these lads fuck each other senseless and get wasted. It's laid back and natural filthy and dirty... these lads get pissed and they take the piss if yeh get our drift. Chris the Scouser shows himself off, proper British n fit as fuck, watch him get banged... after all it is a party, not to mention blonde Liam. From Reading... he knows what he fucking wants!
title: Blokes Down the Boozer
